Lines.string: F.Data.Dictionary.CreateFromSQL("dIndirect","con","SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(JOB,SUFFIX) AS JS,CONVERT(IF('' = '',1,0),SQL_BIT) FROM IND_LBR_ACCTS;")

V.Local.sSQL.Declare(String,"SELECT Distinct CASE When FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'Y' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' THEN CONVERT(1,SQL_BIT) WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD !='Y' Or Flag_WO_PRTD != 'R' Then convert(0,SQL_BIT) END AS FLAG_PRINT,CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD ='X' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' THEN CONVERT(1,SQL_BIT) When FLAG_WO_PRTD != 'X' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD != 'R' THEN CONVERT (0, SQL_BIT) END AS FLAG_RELD,CASE WHEN GWR.REL_DATE = '1900-1-1' THEN null ELSE REL_DATE END AS REL_DATE ,JOB, SUFFIX, NAME_CUSTOMER AS CUST_NAME, PART, LOCATION, PRODUCT_LINE,DESCRIPTION, DATE_OPENED, DATE_DUE,VJH.SCHEDULED_DUE_DATE, (select top 1 VJO.DATE_START FROM V_JOB_OPERATIONS VJO WHERE VJO.LMO='L' AND VJO.JOB=VJH.JOB AND VJO.SUFFIX=VJH.SUFFIX) AS DATE_START, NUM_HOURS,(VJH.QTY_ORDER-VJH.QTY_COMPLETED) AS QTY_LEFT, NOTES AS 'WO_NOTE',VWUF.USER_6 AS 'WO_NOTE2',CONCAT(JOB, SUFFIX) AS JS FROM V_JOB_HEADER VJH LEFT JOIN V_CUSTOMER_MASTER VCM ON VJH.CUSTOMER=VCM.CUSTOMER LEFT JOIN V_WO_USER_FLDS VWUF ON VJH.JOB = VWUF.JOB AND VJH.SUFFIX = VWUF.SUFFIX LEFT JOIN GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT GWR ON GWR.SUFFIX=VJH.SUFFIX AND GWR.JOB = VJH.JOB LEFT JOIN GCG_4242_WO_NOTES A ON VJH.JOB = A.JOB AND VJH.SUFFIX = A.SUFFIX WHERE DATE_CLOSED='1900-1-1' ORDER BY DATE_DUE ASC;")
F.Data.Dictionary.CreateFromSQL("dIndirect2","con","SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(JOB,SUFFIX) AS JS,CONVERT(IF('' = '',1,0),SQL_BIT) FROM IND_LBR_ACCTS;")

V.Local.sSQL.Declare(String,"SELECT Distinct CASE When FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'Y' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' THEN CONVERT(1,SQL_BIT) WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD !='Y' Or Flag_WO_PRTD != 'R' Then convert(0,SQL_BIT) END AS FLAG_PRINT,CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD ='X' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' THEN CONVERT(1,SQL_BIT) When FLAG_WO_PRTD != 'X' OR FLAG_WO_PRTD != 'R' THEN CONVERT (0, SQL_BIT) END AS FLAG_RELD,CASE WHEN GWR.REL_DATE = '1900-1-1' THEN null ELSE REL_DATE END AS REL_DATE ,JOB, SUFFIX, NAME_CUSTOMER AS CUST_NAME, PART, LOCATION, PRODUCT_LINE,DESCRIPTION, DATE_OPENED, DATE_DUE, VJH.SCHEDULED_DUE_DATE,(select top 1 VJO.DATE_START FROM V_JOB_OPERATIONS VJO WHERE VJO.LMO='L' AND VJO.JOB=VJH.JOB AND VJO.SUFFIX=VJH.SUFFIX) AS DATE_START, NUM_HOURS,(VJH.QTY_ORDER-VJH.QTY_COMPLETED) AS QTY_LEFT, NOTES AS 'WO_NOTE',VWUF.USER_6 AS 'WO_NOTE2',CONCAT(JOB, SUFFIX) AS JS FROM V_JOB_HEADER VJH LEFT JOIN V_CUSTOMER_MASTER VCM ON VJH.CUSTOMER=VCM.CUSTOMER LEFT JOIN V_WO_USER_FLDS VWUF ON VJH.JOB = VWUF.JOB AND VJH.SUFFIX = VWUF.SUFFIX LEFT JOIN GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT GWR ON GWR.SUFFIX=VJH.SUFFIX AND GWR.JOB = VJH.JOB LEFT JOIN GCG_4242_WO_NOTES A ON VJH.JOB = A.JOB AND VJH.SUFFIX = A.SUFFIX WHERE DATE_CLOSED='1900-1-1' AND DATE_DUE <= CURDATE() ORDER BY JOB;")

'F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT A.ID,B.FIELD_NAME,B.CAPTION,B.FIXED,A.VISIBLE,A.COL_ORDER FROM GAB_DASH_USERS A JOIN GAB_DASH_FIELDS B ON B.ID = A.FIELDID WHERE GAPID = {0} AND TAB_INDEX = {1} AND GS_USER = '{2}' ORDER BY GAPID;",V.Global.iGAPID,0,V.Caller.User,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Concat("SELECT * FROM GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX = '",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sline)

f.Intrinsic.String.Concat("UPDATE JOB_HEADER SET FLAG_WO_PRTD = CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'X' Then '' WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' Then 'Y' END WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX ='",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sline)

f.Intrinsic.String.Concat("UPDATE JOB_HEADER SET FLAG_WO_PRTD = CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = '' Then 'X' WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'Y' Then 'R' END WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX ='",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sLine)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT * FROM GCG_4242_WO_NOTES WHERE JOB = '{0}' AND SUFFIX = '{1}';",V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)

F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT * FROM WO_USER_FLDS WHERE JOB = '{0}' AND SUFFIX = '{1}';",V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("UPDATE WO_USER_FLDS SET USER_6 = '{0}' WHERE JOB = '{1}' AND SUFFIX = '{2}';",V.Local.sTextTbl,V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Concat("SELECT * FROM GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX = '",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sline)

f.Intrinsic.String.Concat("UPDATE JOB_HEADER SET FLAG_WO_PRTD = CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'X' Then '' WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'R' Then 'Y' END WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX ='",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sline)

f.Intrinsic.String.Concat("UPDATE JOB_HEADER SET FLAG_WO_PRTD = CASE WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = '' Then 'X' WHEN FLAG_WO_PRTD = 'Y' Then 'R' END WHERE JOB = '",v.Local.sTemp3,"' AND SUFFIX ='",v.Local.sTemp2,"'",v.Local.sLine)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT * FROM GCG_4242_WO_NOTES WHERE JOB = '{0}' AND SUFFIX = '{1}';",V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("UPDATE GCG_4242_WO_NOTES SET NOTES = '{0}' WHERE JOB = '{1}' AND SUFFIX = '{2}';",V.Local.sTextTbl,V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("SELECT * FROM WO_USER_FLDS WHERE JOB = '{0}' AND SUFFIX = '{1}';",V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.Intrinsic.String.Build("UPDATE WO_USER_FLDS SET USER_6 = '{0}' WHERE JOB = '{1}' AND SUFFIX = '{2}';",V.Local.sTextTbl,V.Local.sWO,V.Local.sSuf,V.Local.sSQL)
F.ODBC.Connection!Con.Execute("CREATE TABLE GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT(JOB CHAR(6), SUFFIX CHAR(3), REL_DATE DATE, USERID CHAR(8)); ")
'Check what groups the User is in
F.ODBC.Connection!con.Execute("CREATE TABLE GCG_4242_WO_NOTES(JOB CHAR(6),SUFFIX CHAR(3),NOTES LONGVARCHAR);")
F.ODBC.Connection!con.Execute("CREATE INDEX GCG_4242_WO_NOTES01 USING 1 ON GCG_4242_WO_NOTES(JOB);")
F.ODBC.Connection!con.Execute("CREATE INDEX GCG_4242_WO_NOTES02 USING 2 ON GCG_4242_WO_NOTES(SUFFIX);")
F.ODBC.Connection!con.Execute("CREATE TABLE GCG_4242_WODSH_RELDT(JOB CHAR(6),SUFFIX CHAR(3),REL_DATE DATE,USERID CHAR(8));")

'This part was added Valentines day 2017. Customer was under the impression the program would allow him to schedule each line of a sales order.
'We added funcionality from an older script to allow them to select a sales order than call callwrapper 200800
'display a browser for sales orders to select one
Function.Intrinsic.UI.Browser("Select a job","con","Select ORDER_NO, CUSTOMER, DATE_ORDER From V_ORDER_HEADER",Variable.Local.sTitles,Variable.Local.iWidths,Variable.Local.sRet)
'split the return and launch the callwrapper

${$3$}$0$}$$}$0$}$-1$}$$}$12:00:00 AM$}$This will be a custom GAB script that will run from a custom Menu Item under Bill of Material -> File -> Custom Cobalt BOM Import. The user will navigate to the xml file that needs to be loaded into Global Shop. Once the xml is parsed there will be a search in Global Shop to see if a BOM already exists for that Part Number. If one already exists a compare screen will display showing the differences between the two. If one does not exist then the screen will display the BOM as it will be uploaded into Global Shop. Any parts that are listed in the BOM that are not Inventory Parts will be highlighted in Yellow. If there are any parts not in inventory the user will have the option to click the create Parts button to generate those parts in Global Shop. If the BOM exists in Global shop then any differences on the new import will be highlighted in Red. After the Parts have been created then the Upload button will upload and override any previous BOM for that part.
